comment: * NodeLocator maintains information on an XML source * node. * * @author Ovidiu Predescu * @since May 23, 2001

methods.name: public String getPublicId()
methods.comment: * getPublicId returns the public ID of the node. * * @return a String value

methods.name: public String getSystemId()
methods.comment: * getSystemId returns the system ID of the node. * * @return a String value

methods.name: public int getLineNumber()
methods.comment: * getLineNumber returns the line number of the node. * * @return an int value

methods.name: public int getColumnNumber()
methods.comment: * getColumnNumber returns the column number of the * node. * * @return an int value

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: * toString returns a string representation of this * NodeLocator instance. * * @return a String value
